text:
Kesan nya selama 5 hari disini petugasnya baik ramah.
Untuk kamar standard namun rapih,  kamar pun cukup luas. Namun kalau boleh saran bantalnya boleh di perbesar lagi krn menurut saya agak tipis ya. 
Untuk cafenya krn kami paket dgn meeting room jadi mngkin sudah diatur menu2 nya sesuai ketentuan. Untuk rasa lumayan enak, namun mgkin bisa ada bbrp variasi stage makananya agar terlihat banyak, 
Untuk kolam renang krn lokasinya dekat cafe nya jadi ada bbrp rekan yg sungkan gk mencoba  mmgkin beda lagi jika posisinya agak berbeda *tergantung selera. 
Untuk meeting room pun nyaman petugas ramah, wifi n colokan listrik tak masalah. Namun ada bbrp saat ketika download file besar maupun zoomiting wifi agak putus2 jadi bbrp kali mengulang/reconnect gpp lah. 
Untuk tempat sholat, mngkin bisa di cari disuatu ruangan yg agak kondusif krn *maaf terkadang kalau maghrib/isya selama kami break meeting ada music2 Dj dr Lt1 yg tembus ke tempat sholat

Terimakasih untuk 5 hari nya, sukses terus Goodrich suites 🙏🏻

Kebetulan dapet Royal Suite, kamar no 2 paling bagus. #1 nya President Suite
Luas: +50 m2

Gym: Meskipun alatnya minim aja, tapi bersih dan nyaman

Tata Ruang: kamar ini penempatan antara kasur-sofa-TV agak sedikit gimana gitu, agak ga proper aja. Contoh, posisi TV itu ga di depan kasur, jadi kalo gue mau tiduran sambil nonton TV, badan gue harus miring ke kanan dulu.

Air Conditioner: AC nya ternyata ga standby nyala terus atau minimal ready sebelum customer masuk. Jadi disaat kita masuk pertama kali ruangan ini panass benerr. Dan begitu dinyalain butuh waktu kurang lebih 20 menit sampai suhu kamarnya bener-bener adem. Jadi siap-siap sauna dulu yaa!

Meja Kerja: Ini lumayan krusial buat gue, meja kerjanya itu berada di pojok ruangan dan penerangannya minim banget. Meskipun ada lampu meja tetap kerasa kaya remang-remang gitu. Jadinya gue harus pake lampu tambahan disaat nulis di meja kerja ini

text:
Goodrich Suites is still suffering from growing pains as it is brand new. What makes it special is that it is the first luxury-style hotel in the Kemang area, which makes it unique. And the decor and the building is very impressive and well-designed - props to the interior decorator. But despite its beautiful facade, they still don't have a lot of things done right yet.
- when I arrived in my room, there were no bath towels. This is a big miss.
- staffs are nice, but they are still not well-trained - I gave them my luggage and the bellboy struggled to know what to do with it, for example. Similarly, the front desk staff still fumbles through their job - when asked about room service, the first person told me the wrong information, saying it was closed at 1AM (it was not - it was 24 hrs). That said, they were all very polite.
- rooms are well-appointed, but wifi-was spotty at times inside the room itself
- shower area is next to the window, which is strange. It was rather warm to be showering with all the windows next to you (and people seeing you!). Worse, the shower itself kept on undulating between hot and cold
- but the worst is the noise level. On weekdays, the room is super quiet. On weekends, the motorcycles are racing at all times during the night, making it super hard to sleep. They really need to figure the soundproofing out if they want to be next to a major throughway.
- there is really nothing interesting at all nearby the hotel

Positives:
- great to have a hotel of this type within the Kemang area, and the price is good as well
- really love the decor
- the breakfast are has an amazing view
- room is outfitted with bathtub and other amenities, meaning that nothing was lacking
- has a gym, which I didn't expect

With most of the problems ironed out, this could be an easy 4/5 for me. But right now, with its problems still unresolved, I will give it a 3/5 and hope to revisit it when it is better.
title: Promising, but still far to go

I had a leadership training during the weekend, so me and wife decided to get a family weekend getaway nearby. Our friends were recommending to us a newly open hotel in Antasari with 5 stars service and facilities. 

We were not mistaken. We really enjoyed our stay there. The breakfast buffet, a combination of western and local Indonesian, so tasty yet light. Delicious!

One night we also ordered food from room service. It was really good! The spaghetti bolognese and bakmie godok were awesome! 

During one morning we spent a morning swim with our son. So peaceful :)

I would really love to come back!

text:
My 1st visit to this hotel. But starting with shocked end with disappointment. 
During check in all was perfect, when the moment i got my key card(but only a dirty reuse key holder) the lady at reception forgot to put the key inside. And the key was handle to me by another staff.
When step in the room, the room was warm with kind of funny smell. And the room assigned was different from what i booked (Royal suite room) from Agoda(understandable some times happened to those 3rd party agents) but this kind reviews been appearing in goodrich suites google review many times. And it shouldn't happened again by putting more details, rather then disappointment.
Calling for some one come to room due to dirty stains blanket, pillow case and also blood stain bedsheet and it took 30 mins for the front office manager to come. Thanks for the helpful hskp attendance.
When go to the restaurant, staffs are rather gathering and not come to the guest table asking or offering menu.
Dirty mini bar fridge, dirty bedsheet with stain...5 star hotel???
title: Interesting 5 star hotel in jakarta

text:
I was staying in Royal Suites, The room is really spacious and clean. What I really like about this room was the big window, great city view, & clean bathroom with bathtub.

For the food option, since this hotel is located near Kemang, South Jakarta, there are many good food options in the area which you can go there, or just deliver it to the hotel using Grab or Gojek.

The only downside was the check-in process took too long, I'm waiting for about 1 hour until I get to my room. Besides that, everything was exceptional, the staff, the security, the room, superb!

Recommended!
title: Great place for a staycation in Jakarta with Great View!

text:
Located strategically in the heart of south Jakarta, Goodrich hotel offers an affordable package that includes a spacious and comfortable stay. Because it is a hotel that I always passed on my commute, I've always wanted to try it out but never had the chance until recently when my wife and I had the opportunity to stay here.

Our stay was wonderful. Check-in was a breeze, and the staff were very friendly and attentive. Our room was massive and bathroom was large enough for a bathtub and a shower. Toilet is high tech, heated seat! 

Because we stayed during our wedding anniversary, the hotel gave us a complimentary dessert, lovely.

I've stayed at many hotels in Indonesia and honestly, for the price, quality, and service that you get, Goodrich is hard to beat.

Thank you Adit, Olive, Aldi, Hana and Fanny for your exceptional hospitality during our trip. We'll definitely visit again when the opportunity presents itself. 
Thanks Goodrich!
title: A pleasant stay like no other

Situated in Pangeran Antasari road, there's Goodrich Suites managed by Artotel. The design is contemporary mixed with modern touch. 

Arrived in the room, we're pretty amazed by the size. It's so spacious yeah typical suite. Comfy, modern, full amenities, sliding cupboard, work desk, sofa, and bathroom fully equipped with shower room, vanity, and bathtub. 

The air conditioner worked really well and really cool, although the wifi was a bit challenging during the day and then worked smoothly at night.

The situation during WFH restriction brought the hotel into a quiet atmosphere, like a sanctuary, less guests and less noise.

The gym serves its purpose, and the swimming pool, although it's not big it's acceptable. 

We struggled a bit with our card key, it could give access to our room but sometimes it just didnt work in the elevator so we needed to ask the receptionist for another key a few times.

text:
We just completed a 2 night stay at the Goodrich Suites in Jakarta. While to rooms are quite nice and the beds are larger in size, we found our stay had a few issues.
To start, we arrived for the 2pm check-in and there was only one person working the front end and a 4 person wait. We were told that the other staff was on break, which is a little odd to have breaks set up at check-in time. 
The second was with the restaurant, we had a lovely evening meal and wanted to finish off with something sweet. We told the wait staff twice what we wanted and when it still didn't arrive after 45 minutes,  we decided to get the check and go.
Third was breakfast buffet. While there were a good variety of choices, most were not warm  and poorly seasoned. On the first day they charged us 1/2 price for our two kids then the second day they charged fully price for our 11 y/o daughter. When we asked at the front desk on check out, we were told that 11 and up was charged as adult. The funny thing is that ever where else we have traveled it was 12 and up was considered adult. 
We had to have a card reprogrammed and the hotel seemed to have very little business. 
Lastly, the noise from the elevated roadway directly out in front of the hotel would have motorcycles buzzing buy at all hours. The roadway is even with the 2nd floor of the hotel so anything above, the noise unavoidable. 

All in all it was a nice stay but their staff could tighten up a little bit. As for the restaurant, they need a real chef to prep their meal plans and run their buffet service. 

I would give them a 3 out of 5

Ken Cunningham
title: Not quite up par

Stayed at this place during 4 nights business trip. And found it very disappointing.

WIFI: there is no internet for 3 nights of our stay. And for 3 nights we have been requesting the management SEVERAL TIMES to fix the wifi but they dont respond till the 4th night.

NO QIBLAT: there is no qillblat sign in the room I stayed which is very important for Muslim to pray 5 times a day. And we got two different instructions from hotel staff.

LEAKAGE: The plumber came 3 times to fix our toilet.

NOISY: right above our floor there is a bar that play live music, where we couldn't sleep all night!

Im not a picky costumer but the dissappointment staying at this hotel made me do MY FIRST TIME IN LIFE COMMENTING FOR A HOTEL!!

If i can suggest to the management, Next time you should do better than (picture below) when handling a disappointed costumer, or downgrade your level of management to a no star Motel.
title: Finally im out of this suites/hotel!!

text:
We went here as a family for a staycation and to celebrate our 3rd anniversary. After some delicious welcome drinks, we went to our room and to our surprise, they upgraded our room! The room was spacious, thank God, enough space for our 2 yo to roam around. They have this glam 20s interior that goes from lobby to their rooms which I like. Bed was comfy, room was clean and neat. And the mini bar have this lovely single serving drip bags javanegra coffee and that really made our stay special.
You wouldn't want to skip their breakfast buffet, because there were lots of delicious options!
title: Brand New and Spacious

text:
After a long few weeks at work, I was looking for a weekend staycation to get caught up on some much needed rest and relaxation. Lalalaway was offering a voucher for a Suite Room through their website, so I decided to try it out after looking at reviews here on TripAdvisor. 

I found the room to be extremely spacious and well-appointed, with a giant wardrobe, a working desk, a comfortable couch, huge bed with two nightstands and plugs for electronics, blackout curtains and a luxurious bathroom with an oversize rain shower and bathtub. For the price I paid, the room definitely exceeded my expectations and was perfect for the rest I wanted. 

Everyone who I ran into during my stay at Goodrich Suites was extremely warm and welcoming. It's all about the small details, which they seem to be working hard to do - after check-in, I received a call to make sure everything was okay; during breakfast each morning, everyone called me by name; and when I requested another bottle of water, they had no problem giving me four bottles (at no charge, either!). It was these small things that really made the difference for me. 

I would definitely recommend this hotel for those wanting a bit of luxury at an affordable price in the Kemang area and look forward to coming back in the future!
title: Affordable luxury in the Kemang area

text:
Newly opened hotel and have a pleasant stay with family during weekend.

The product was awesome and service level also meet expectation as 5 star hotel. I have tried one of the room service menu and the breakfast also taste good but no chance to visit Roosevelt Bar. Maybe next visit

Easy access to Kemang village Mall and to cipete area where some resto and cafe available.

Looking forward to coming back again in near future. Highly recommended hotel...
title: Pleasant stay

text:
I visited this hotel for my wifes birthday, they brought cake in midnight as my request, giving us free complimentary breakfast, and all employee know us by our name, its a little thing but people loves how they name was reminded. The service was so fast, the people are very nice and kind. 

The room so big and cozy, the toilet seat was warm lol. The breakfast is really way of chart, all the breakfast menu was delicious. 

The pool was closed when we arrived, after we requested that we are going to swim cause we brought our child, the pool was prepared and cleaned as fast as possible so we could swim.

You wont regret staying in this hotel, i even extend my stay for another day and brought my mom there.

Well i cant post any pic cause the image was too large for the size.
